comment.body: we definitely are in some real dire straits, any future economic model must take into account our environment. further reading about the merchant class if anyone is interested. [1](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zPIhMJGWiM8) [2](https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1894-c3/ch20.htm).

very interesting, i haven't read about control or strain theory. it gives people a tool to think about conformity (of theirs and others). [Marx's theory of alienation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marx%27s_theory_of_alienation) is also a great read if anyone is interested on the subject.
